Class Waveform

java.lang.Object
ch.epfl.cs107.play.signal.wave.Waveform
All Implemented Interfaces:
Signal
Direct Known Subclasses:
Sawtooth, Sine, Square, Triangle
abstract class Waveform extends Object implements Signal
Implementation of Waveform signal defined by wavelength (lambda), amplitude (a) and phase (phi)
